title: Discovering reinforcers (TEFC)

description: Episode of Series "Effective Behavioural Programming". Tape 1 : The use of reinforcers in the classroom is the key to motivating students. Reinforcers are events that follow a response and increase the probability that the response will occur again. Retarded people have fewer reinforcers. It is important for a teacher to discover appropriate reinforcers for the particular class NB. This tape is on 525 line NTSC.
